title: Two-Way Table: Lions and Tigers and Bears
question_text: The Bears and Tigers each score a mean of 50 points per game. Points Scored Per Game Points Scored Per Game Mean Median Bears 50 40 Tigers 50 50 Which of the following statements is most likely true?

choices.text: The Bears and Tigers both have a symmetrical distribution.
The Bears distribution has a positive skew (right skewed).
The Bears distribution has a negative skew (left skewed).
The Tigers distribution has a positive skew (right skewed).
The Tigers distribution has a negative skew (left skewed).
